attributes.additional_details: How many more body's are people going to find when just taking a morning walk through this lane. Some people take their children through this lane for school or to the supermarket Tesco's. Some even play football games on the field.
attributes.background:
Claire Hood who was only 15 got sexually raped and killed innocently in the Cathcob woods. This happened in 1995. In late 2015 a knifepoint robbery took place. 
On the 22nd of november 2018, a deceased 32 year-old man was found.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This would be a decision for the landowner.
